revisions.*: Because "rvslots" was not specified, a legacy format has been used for the output. This format is deprecated, and in the future the new format will always be used.

__TOC__

=Description=

A bent rod is a special fishing pole which can be crafted using the [[Carpentry]] and [[Tailoring]] skill. Bent rods can fish up [[Message in a Bottle]] chests without pulling up junk items. You must be in the [[Britain Crafting Area]] to craft the rod.
